tweets.text: Today, we celebrate #CityHallSelfie Day - a worldwide celebration of local government pride. City of Puyallup staff came out to the front steps of City Hill to show our pride in what we do, every day, to serve our community. Oh, and we wore some funny hats too.   @ELGL50 https://t.co/WU1W8klEIM

Today, city employees are showing their pride in The City of Hampton by participating in #CityHallSelfie Day. This is a worldwide celebration of local government service. It showcases pride in local government and its work for the communities it serves https://t.co/o8CIBiqZO3
